info.author: Elena "of Valhalla" Grandi
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
dumb is a suite of tools to manage collections of bookmarks that are:

* indipendent from the browser / application:
   dumb bookmarks can point to anything that has an URL, regardless 
   of the app needed to open them.
* shareable and distributed:
   dumb bookmarks are designed to be easily managed in a DVCS to provide 
   an easy mean to share a bookmark collection within a team, a community 
   or the whole world.

Getting dumb
------------

Homepage: http://dumb.trueelena.org
public git repository:

* `web interface <https://gitorious.org/dumb/dumb>`_
* git::

   git clone git://gitorious.org/dumb/dumb.git


Installation
------------

The dumb module depends on python >= 2.5 and `PyYAML <http://pyyaml.org/>`_.
Some scripts may require additional modules; e.g. dumb-to-jinja2 
requires `jinja2 <http://jinja.pocoo.org/>`_.
Support for python 3.x is planned, but still not implemented.

Dumb can be installed using distutils::

   python ./setup.py install


Documentation is in RestructuredText and can be built to various formats 
using `sphinx <http://sphinx.pocoo.org/>`_; in the ``docs/`` directory 
run e.g.:

   make html

to build the html documentation.
Manpages for the scripts are also available and can be build using::

   make man

dumb is a suite of tools to manage collections of bookmarks that are:

  • indipendent from the browser / application:
    dumb bookmarks can point to anything that has an URL, regardless of the app needed to open them.
  • shareable and distributed:
    dumb bookmarks are designed to be easily managed in a DVCS to provide an easy mean to share a bookmark collection within a team, a community or the whole world.

Getting dumb

Homepage: http://dumb.trueelena.org public git repository:

  • web interface

  • git:

    git clone git://gitorious.org/dumb/dumb.git

Installation

The dumb module depends on python >= 2.5 and PyYAML. Some scripts may require additional modules; e.g. dumb-to-jinja2 requires jinja2. Support for python 3.x is planned, but still not implemented.

Dumb can be installed using distutils:

Documentation is in RestructuredText and can be built to various formats using sphinx; in the docs/ directory run e.g.:

to build the html documentation. Manpages for the scripts are also available and can be build using:
